content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions during the transition period to EPAM, please address them to your dedicated HR Contact or to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAMAIntegration@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA M&A Integration Team\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
